phrases: Hey...
Rin.
Wake up.
Come over here.
It was just a dream.
There is nothing to worry about.
Huh?
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
Something is off.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
So, why?
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
as something never-ending.
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
Here, I will take one, too.
Grandpa used to make them, too!
Is that right?
You know what, I want my own knife.
You are still a little too young...
They have got'them for kids, too!
Seriously?
I will think about it.
Come on, let us eat.
We have got to get going soon.
Okay.
Is not the baby cute?
Yeah.
I am Kawachi, a relative of Kaga Rin-san's father.
Right now, Rin-san and I... Rin and I are living together.
Oh...
Um... You are Yoshii Masako-san...
You are Rin's mother, correct?
Um...
M-Me?
Yes...
I would like to meet you in person and talk about something.
Near you is fine, so if you could pick a place...
Place...
Um...
Oh, I do not know...
I guess in the shopping area, at the...
Sorry, I do not have any idea where you live...
This is so cute!
More crafts, Mom?
You made this flower, too?
That is right.
It is called embroidery.
Wow!
That is amazing!
When you get a little bigger, I will teach you how to do it.
Really?
Since you are so good with your hands, Rin-chan.
So what is your plan?
I cannot say until I meet her...
Well, keep an eye on Rin while I am out.
Daikichi...
It is important.
So have a good long talk with her.
Mom's been looking forward to spending time with Rin-chan anyway.
This is really close to Grandpa's house...
Are you alone, sir?
One more person is coming afterwards.
Non-smoking, please...
Watch out!
You are going to spill!
The stress just keeps building...
Believe me, I have been there!
Americano, please.
One Americano!
Would you like anything else?
No, thank you.
This is very nice, Saionji-sensei!
But I would expect no less from you.
Now you just need to give each character some trauma,
two or three problems each...
D-Do not you think that is overdoing it?
No, I think that would be perfect!
It does not make sense...
After she went to all the trouble
of erasing her every trace in Grandpa's house...
Does she still live near here?
Then I will see you soon, Sensei.
Thank you for coming.
Pretty slipshod for someone who ran off...
Mama, I have to pee!
Yeah, yeah.
Just hold it a few minutes.
Hello?
Where are you now?
I am already in the restaurant.
I am already in the restaurant.
S-Souichi-san...
Wrong.
I am his grandson.
She is like a little kid...
YOU-Um... I am sorry about that.
It is just that you look so much like him...
That is okay...
In fact, just recently, someone else told me that...
But now that I have a chance to really see you...
Souichi-san had a kinder look about him...
Yeah...
I brought a photo of Rin.
Thank you...
It was taken at the beginning of the year.
At a rice cake-pounding party at her nursery school.
She seems...
so much like a young lady...
Before, someone called you Sensei...
W-Were you watching?
But the name is...
That is my pen name.
Sorry...
I am totally out of it after pulling an all-nighter because of deadline hell...
Is that work the reason you left Rin behind?
Um...
And apparently you made Rin think that you were just the housekeeper,
but is that from when she was born?
Mm...
My work is the reason.
But it is also true that I was Souichi-san's maid.
Even while I was pregnant, though,
I was resolved not to think of Rin as my daughter.
S-Sorry.
I am not sure I understand...
For the longest time, I was not popular at all...
Then, just as I was about to finally land a major assignment,
I found out I was pregnant...
And it is not the kind of work you can do and raise a kid at the same time...
But Souichi-san encouraged me to have the child nevertheless...
Every day, I would either work or stay in bed, and just got fatter and flabbier...
But even so, weirdly enough...
When Rin was born, I thought she was so cute, my heart went out to her.
Weirdly enough...?
That is why, even while telling myself that Rin was not my daughter,
I tried desperately to both work and raise her.
But it was tough trying to be a day person...
And sometimes I have to go out at night for meetings,
which means being up late...
It was just physically impossible...
Um...
I hear that Rin stayed with you in an apartment at night?
Yes...
Did you ever go out at night then?
Well, it was more the middle of the night.
Rin was already sleeping, so I went out for a little while...
And sometimes Souichi-san watched her then...
Even now, Rin occasionally wakes up after midnight.
Did not you ever think about how she would feel when she did,
and no one was next to her?
But...
Then how else was I supposed to raise a child on my own?
Well, my grandfather wanted the three of you to be a family, did not he?
Do you have a problem with me continuing to live with Rin?
No.
I am not Rin's mother anymore,
so I do not have the right to make those kinds of choices.
Even though it is beyond dispute that Rin was in your belly?
Th-That has nothing to do with it!
How do you actually feel about Rin?
Is she important to you or not?
I-I do not know...
Um... I just have one favor to ask...
What is it?
When that girl goes to school, please let her use your family name.
If her surname is different from that of her guardian,
I am sure she will have a rough time...
Would you just promise me that?
I know where you are coming from, but...
But I cannot promise that...
She is always been Kaga Rin up to now...
I do not think a person's name is such a simple thing to change...
I am a woman,
so I do not have any great affection for or attachment to my family name.
One day, it might change anyways...
Rin's a woman, too, so she probably feels the same way.
Yeah, but Rin's still six...
And that is not what I am talking about.
Besides which, it is just your own personal opinion!
There is only one thing that is important!
And that is her name, Rin, which Souichi-san gave her.
Now, excuse me!
Look...
I am a man, so I do not really get what you are saying.
But...
I can talk to her about it.
Talk to her about it?
You would make that little girl decide?!
Do not you think that is cruel?!
I am thinking about what is best for Rin.
And making the decision for her is what would be cruel.
First, I have got to ask Rin how she feels.
After that, the two of us will decide together,
and I will let you know afterwards what the answer is.
It sounds like she is no good!
I am sure of it!
Who would abandon a cute little girl like that?!
It defies common sense!
Well, she does at least worry about Rin...
It is just, she is a little odd.
It is like she has no awareness of getting other people involved in her mess.
What are you talking about?!
Naturally, a mother would worry about her daughter!
But if she really worried about her, she would want to see her!
Now, now.
We do not know the woman's circumstances.
Have an orange.
What did Grandpa ever see in her?
Well, at this stage, that hardly matters...
The thing is, she demanded that when Rin starts school, she use my surname.
Oh, well, I agree with that.
Of course a child should have the same family name as her guardian.
Well, yeah...
I understand, but...
How am I supposed to explain that to Rin?
When she is already got a name of her own...
Well, she is a girl,
so her family name will change anyway when she gets married...
That again?!
What again?
It is much more preferable for her to use our family name at school
than let someone make a crack about her differing name and hurt her feelings.
And you think she can keep that all straight?
There is a lot going on, even in elementary school.
I just do not want things to be difficult for her.
Fine, I will adopt Rin.
As long as she does not object...
That way, she will really be Kawachi Rin...
Yeah, that way's more natural...
Do not talk so glibly about such an important thing!
I am not being glib!
This is something that is got to be decided, am I right?!
It is all the same if it is now or later!
Easy, easy...
It is not all the same!
Yes, it is!
It absolutely is!
I am not passing the baton to anyone else.
That would be the worst thing I could do to Rin.
If it is for Rin, I can accept my fate.
Kid's Knife
Here.
This is mine?
Yep, it is yours.
But you can only use when I am next to you, got it?
If you promise me that, you get to use the knife.
I promise!
You know what, I will make curry for you!
You serious?
Tonight!
Let us make it tomorrow...
Huh?
I forget, do I push or pull?
Huh?
Give it here a sec...
Oh, like this...
Daikichi, you are good at that!
Yeah, well, I lived alone for a long time...
Now you try.
Go nice and slow...
Do not drink the bathwater.
I will not.
Go up to your shoulders and count to ten.
Okay.
One...
One, two...
two, three...
three, four, shut the door...
five, six, pick up sticks, seven...
four, five, six...
Daikichi, you are counting slow!
Do not be in such a hurry to eat.
Okay.
Hey, Rin...
What?
Nevermind...
Your curry's delicious!
Oh, no...
That is okay...
Mm...
You know...
I am not your father...
I know.
But I am not your big brother either, right?
Nobody thinks that!
I am just giving a for instance!
The question is, what am I then?
Daikichi!
That is my name...
Listen, and this is only if you are not against it...
What I am trying to say...
How can I put it...?
Uh...
What do you...
Rin, what would you think...
about me becoming your real father?
Daikichi, you...
become my father?
So, say we did that, your name would become Kawachi Rin...
Kawachi...
Rin.
No.
Do not you think it would be better if you had a father?
My father is Grandpa.
My name is Kaga Rin and I like it.
It is the same name as Grandpa.
That is important.
I see...
Daikichi should just stay Daikichi.
Daikichi?
What is wrong?
Are you crying?
This is sweat!
It is still only March...
Oh, shut up!
Just open your mouth!
It was open, but you were crying!
I said I was not crying!
Move your head up a little more...
'Kay...
Y'know, this will always be your home...
Yeah.
Congratulations on Graduating from Nursery School
We must not forget what we believe.
Because the morning will surely come.
We must not lose our dreams.
Because one day they will surely come true.
The first step...
Step to tomorrow...
Starting today, everything will be new!
The first step...
Step to tomorrow...
Build that courage up, nice and big...
And take that first step out!
I understand.
You are going to get fat, you know...
That is fine.
Either way, I am good for nothing.
Give me one.
Forget it.
A sunny early Sunday afternoon
Let us go somewhere today
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I feel like dashing out
Sing, la, la, la
My voice out to forever
I am already high, high, high
Ride the dancing wind
Sing, la, la, la
My voice springs up
Only babies get held like that!
That is what Sayaka-chan said!
There are times when even adults want to be held in someone is arms.
Adults?!
Why?!
I do not know myself.
Is it still okay to be held, even after I become a first-grader?
Why, sure!
I will hold you no matter how old you are...
W-What?!
I am sorry.
I should have held you before.
I will hold you the next time you cry, Daikichi.
What the...?
Do not worry!
Am I raising Rin or is she raising me?
Sometimes I wonder...
